bookingConfirmation.confirmedSubtitle: You'll receive a confirmation email shortly from our service partner, Viator

rejectionReasons.BOOKABLE_ITEM_IS_NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE:
We’re sorry, this experience isn’t available anymore.
Find something else to enjoy by exploring other available experiences.
rejectionReasons.WEATHER:
We’re sorry, this experience isn’t available right now due to weather conditions.
Please check back later or explore other options.
rejectionReasons.DUPLICATE_BOOKING:
It looks like you’ve already booked this experience.
Please check your email for your booking confirmation or explore other options to find something new.
rejectionReasons.PRODUCT_NO_LONGER_OPERATING:
We’re sorry, this experience is no longer operating.
Find something else to enjoy by exploring other available experiences.
rejectionReasons.MINIMUM_NUMBER_OF_PASSENGERS_NOT_MET:
This experience requires more participants in order to book.
Please add more people to complete your booking or explore other experiences.
rejectionReasons.SIGNIFICANT_GLOBAL_EVENT_FORCE_MAJEURE:
This experience isn’t available due to unexpected events.
Please check back later or explore other options.
rejectionReasons.TOUR_WAS_CANCELLED:
We’re sorry, but this experience has been cancelled.
Explore other experiences to find something else to enjoy.
rejectionReasons.ISSUE_WITH_TICKET:
There was an issue generating your ticket.
Please try going through the checkout process again to book your experience.
rejectionReasons.ISSUE_WITH_PICKUP:
There’s an issue with the pickup location you selected.
Please choose a different pickup point to complete your booking.
rejectionReasons.ISSUE_WITH_PAYMENT:
There was an issue processing your payment, and we weren’t able to confirm your booking.
Please check your payment details and try again.
rejectionReasons.INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS:
Your payment was declined due to insufficient funds.
Please use a different payment method.
rejectionReasons.INVALID_PAYMENT_DETAILS:
Your payment was declined due to invalid payment details.
Please review your payment details.
rejectionReasons.SUSPECTED_FRAUD:
Your payment was flagged as potentially fraudulent.
Please use a different payment method.
rejectionReasons.SOFT_DECLINE:
Your payment was declined due to some issues.
Please review your payment details.
rejectionReasons.HARD_DECLINE:
Your payment was declined due to a permanent payment failure.
Please use a different debit/credit card
rejectionReasons.THREE_D_SECURE_REQUIRED:
Your payment was declined due to unsuccessful 3DS authentication.
Please try again.
rejectionReasons.INTERNAL_ERROR:
Your payment was declined due to an internal error.
Please try again later.
rejectionReasons.PROCESSOR_UNAVAILABLE:
Your payment was declined due to some issues.
Please review your payment details.
rejectionReasons.PROCESSOR_ISSUE_WITH_PAYMENT:
Your payment was declined due to some issues.
Please review your payment details.
rejectionReasons.TRANSACTION_NOT_ALLOWED:
Your bank declined the transaction.
Please use a different debit/credit card
rejectionReasons.CARD_INACTIVE:
Your card is inactive.
Please use a different debit/credit card
rejectionReasons.CARD_RESTRICTED:
Restrictions have been placed on your card.
Please use a different debit/credit card
rejectionReasons.OTHER:
Something went wrong, and we couldn’t confirm your booking.
Don’t worry, your payment wasn’t processed. Explore other experiences or try again later.

introduction.title: Your next food adventure starts here
introduction.subtitleOne: Find the perfect experience near you
introduction.textOne: From hands-on cooking classes to immersive wine tastings, search by location to discover unforgettable culinary adventures. Whether you’re exploring your hometown or traveling abroad, there’s something delicious waiting for you.
introduction.textTwo: We’ve partnered with our sister company, Viator, to bring you exceptional food experiences. Book through TheFork, and Viator will take care of the confirmation and details, so you can focus on what matters—enjoying your next adventure

cancellationPolicy.title: Cancellation Policy

standard.summary: You can cancel up to 24 hours in advance of the experience for a full refund.
standard.list:
• For a full refund, you must cancel at least 24 hours before the experience’s start time.
  • If you cancel less than 24 hours before the experience’s start time, the amount you paid will not be refunded.
  • Any changes made less than 24 hours before the experience’s start time will not be accepted.
  • Cut-off times are based on the experience’s local time.

custom.summary: You can cancel up to {count, plural, one {# day} other {# days}} in advance of the experience for a full refund.
custom.fullRefund: For a full refund, you must cancel at least {count, plural, one {# full day} other {# full days}} before the experience’s start time.
custom.partialRefund: For a {percent}% refund, you must cancel {from}–{to} full days before the experience’s start time.
custom.noRefundFirst: If you cancel less than {count, plural, one {# full day} other {# full days}} before the experience’s start time, the amount you paid will not be refunded.
custom.noRefundSecond: Any changes made less than {count, plural, one {# full day} other {# full days}} before the experience’s start time will not be accepted.
custom.cutOff: Cut-off times are based on the experience’s local time.

cancellationPolicy.salesFinal: This experience is non-refundable and cannot be changed for any reason. If you cancel or ask for an amendment, the amount you paid will not be refunded.
cancellationPolicy.badWeather: This experience requires good weather. If it’s canceled due to poor weather, you’ll be offered a different date or a full refund.
cancellationPolicy.insufficientTravelers: This experience requires a minimum number of travelers. If it’s canceled because the minimum isn’t met, you’ll be offered a different date/experience or a full refund.
cancellationPolicy.upToDayHours: Up to 24 hours before the experience starts (local time)
cancellationPolicy.upToDaysInAdvance: Up to {count, plural, one {# day} other {# days}} in advance
cancellationPolicy.noRefund: You will not receive a refund if you cancel.
cancellationPolicy.cancelUntil: Cancel until {date} (local time) for a partial refund.

tourOperator.legal:
This operator has self-certified that they are committed to only offer services that comply with applicable laws, including EU law.

For your protection, make sure you use Viator's platform to communicate with operators and pay for bookings.
tourOperator.business: This supplier is a trader on the Viator marketplace. Viator is an online intermediation platform that allows consumers to buy experiences from third-party providers. For your protection, make sure you use Viator's platform to communicate with operators and pay for bookings.
tourOperator.individual:
This experience is operated by a private individual and not a business. This means that you may not be protected under the same consumer protection rules under EU and UK law if you book this experience. However, Viator will provide you with the same customer service as with any other booking.



Viator is an online intermediation platform that allows consumers to buy experiences from third-party providers.

modals.sessionExpiredText:
It looks like you’ve been away for a bit.
Just click the button below

to continue booking
modals.availabilityChangedText:
Unfortunately, this product is no longer available for your selected dates.
Please, check other available options.
modals.somethingWentWrongText:
Something went wrong and we couldn't load this content.
Please reload and try again
modals.notBookableText:
We’re very sorry, but this experience isn’t supported by TheFork.


Find something else to enjoy by exploring other available experiences.
modals.unexpectedBookingErrorText:
We’re very sorry, seems unexpected error has happened.


Please, retry you booking attempt.
